title: Happy Birthday, Maki-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0108/>Happy Birthday, Maki~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Thank you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Alright, let’s go. The helicopter will be here soon.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Huh!? Helicopter!? Where are we going!? Isn’t today’s party in the clubroom....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>That’s right.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Then can’t we just walk there? That surprised me....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Before we go to the clubroom, we’re going to go on a sightseeing tour of the Tokyo sky~♪ Mari has also prepared some cold juice in the helicopter, so let’s have a toast♪ They did it on a movie that Mari saw with Shizuku the other day~, this kind of birthday surprise! So Mari also wanted to try this out! Look, the helicopter is here!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Wait, wait, you’re giving me so much information that I can’t process them all. Sightseeing tour of the sky? Birthday surprise in a movie? Juice?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>It’s fine, it’s fine. You’ll get it once we get in! Let’s go!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Hey, wait, explain it in a way that I can understand!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
